description:
Scratch-building an encounter set-piece for Dungeons & Dragons - a Duergar caravan.

Other terrain in this video:

Underdark Scatter - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Sjh_wnjjU7U

title: Building a Duergar Caravan Wagon for Dungeons and Dragons, Out of the Abyss
